tech.ferus.util.config

Class ConfigKey<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.ferus.util.config.ConfigKey<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of object that this ConfigKey should reference

    public class ConfigKey<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An object designed to allow easy data-grabbing from a ConfigFile.

      • ConfigKey

        private ConfigKey(@Nonnull
                  java.lang.Object[] key,

                  T def)

        Parameters:

        def - the default value to be returned if an existing value cannot be obtained

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @Nullable
public T get(@Nonnull
                        ConfigFile config)
        Returns the value stored in configuration for this key.

        If the path doesn't exist, there is no value, or an exception occurs, the default value for this ConfigKey will be returned.

        Parameters:
        config - the ConfigFile to look through
        Returns:
        the value stored in configuration for this key

      • get

        @Nullable
public T get(@Nonnull
                        ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode node)
        Returns the value stored in configuration for this key.

        If the path doesn't exist, there is no value, or an exception occurs, the default value for this ConfigKey will be returned.

        Parameters:
        node - the ConfigurationNode to look through
        Returns:
        the value stored in configuration for this key

      • get

        @Nullable
public T get(@Nonnull
                        ConfigFile config,
                        @Nullable
                        T def)
        Returns the value stored in configuration this key.

        Note: If this ConfigKey has a default value set, this method will ignore it and use the provided default value.

        Parameters:
        config - the ConfigFile to look through
        def - the default value to be returned if an existing value cannot be obtained
        Returns:
        the value stored in configuration for this key, or default

      • get

        @Nullable
public T get(@Nonnull
                        ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode node,
                        @Nullable
                        T def)
        Returns the value stored in configuration this key.

        Note: If this ConfigKey has a default value set, this method will ignore it and use the provided default value.

        Parameters:
        node - the ConfigurationNode to look through
        def - the default value to be returned if an existing value cannot be obtained
        Returns:
        the value stored in configuration for this key, or default

      • setWithException

        public void setWithException(@Nullable
                             ConfigFile config,
                             @Nullable
                             T value)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Sets and saves a value for the node located at the path for this key.
        Parameters:
        config - the ConfigFile to save to
        value - the value to change the node to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the configuration file cannot be saved to

      • set

        public boolean set(@Nullable
                   ConfigFile config,
                   @Nullable
                   T value)
        Sets and saves a value for the node located at the path for this key.
        Parameters:
        config - the ConfigFile to save to
        value - the value to change the node to
        Returns:
        true if the configuration was saved; false otherwise

      • set

        public void set(@Nonnull
                ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode node,

        Sets a value for the node located at the path for this key.

        Does NOT save.

        Parameters:
        node - the ConfigurationNode to set.
        value - the value to change the node to

      • of

        public static <T> ConfigKey<T> of(java.lang.Object key)
        Convenience method to construct a new ConfigKey.

        The purpose of this method is purely to reduce new ConfigKey(new Object[]{"string"}); to ConfigKey.of("string");.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object that the ConfigKey should reference
        Parameters:
        key - the path to the node on the top level
        Returns:
        a new ConfigKey with the specified path
